Package fr.ign.artiscales.pm.decomposition

Class TopologicalStraightSkeletonParcelDecomposition

java.lang.Object
fr.ign.artiscales.pm.decomposition.TopologicalStraightSkeletonParcelDecomposition
public class TopologicalStraightSkeletonParcelDecomposition
extends java.lang.Object
Re-implementation of block decomposition into parcels from : Vanegas, C. A., Kelly, T., Weber, B., Halatsch, J., Aliaga, D. G., MÃ¼ller, P., May 2012. Procedural generation of parcels in urban modeling. Comp. Graph. Forum 31 (2pt3). Decomposition method by using straight skeleton

    • createParcels

      private java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Polygon> createParcels​(double minWidth, double maxWidth, double omega, org.apache.commons.math3.random.RandomGenerator rng) throws EdgeException

    • fixDiagonalEdges

      private fr.ign.artiscales.tools.graph.recursiveGraph.TopologicalGraph fixDiagonalEdges​(fr.ign.artiscales.tools.graph.recursiveGraph.TopologicalGraph alphaStrips, java.util.Map<fr.ign.artiscales.tools.graph.recursiveGraph.HalfEdge,​java.util.Optional<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>>> attributes) throws EdgeException
      The Î±-strips computed from the skeleton faces suffer from diagonal edges at the intersection of logical streets [...]. To correct these edges, we modify LS (B) [...] to transfer a near-triangular region from the strip on one side of an offending edge to the strip on the other side. We refer to these corrected strips as Î²-strips. TODO support multiple supporting vertex classification schemes
      Parameters:
      alphaStrips - Î±-strips
      attributes - attributes of the edges (used to classify supporting vertices)
      Returns:
      Î²-strips
      Throws:
      EdgeException

      private java.util.stream.Stream<fr.ign.artiscales.tools.graph.recursiveGraph.HalfEdge> getSupportingEdges​(fr.ign.artiscales.tools.graph.recursiveGraph.Node node, fr.ign.artiscales.tools.graph.recursiveGraph.Face split, java.util.List<fr.ign.artiscales.tools.graph.recursiveGraph.HalfEdge> internalEdges)
